text: Roger thank God you're back everybody
Roger's back oh Roger what a relief we
don't have to be scared anymore yeah
maybe we can leave the house
now wait a minute you haven't left the
house in 3 weeks you told us we'd all
die if we did huh I guess I did say that
but how have you survived it hasn't been
easy the toilet paper ran out before the
food so that was gross but when we
started eating the couch we stopped
needing toilet paper the stuffing wipes
itself on the way out okay this is bad
